snippet: Amazon said it would allow members of its $99 annual Prime loyalty program free downloads of some shows and movies from its streaming video service to watch offline.
abstract: Amazon Prime members will now be able to download some shows and movies from company's streaming video service for free.
lead_paragraph: Amazon said it would allow members of its $99 annual Prime loyalty program free downloads of some shows and movies from its streaming video service to watch offline.
